description:
This bug fixed the majority of the finish_migration cleanup:
https://bugs.launchpad.net/nova/+bug/1073303

There is one remaining bit of cleanup that is required:
* look at move_disks
* if this is not run, we need to make sure the temp dir is cleaned up
title: xenapi: in finish_migration should clean up move_disks if not used

comments.content:
This bug fixed the majority of the finish_migration cleanup:
https://bugs.launchpad.net/nova/+bug/1073303

There is one remaining bit of cleanup that is required:
* look at move_disks
* if this is not run, we need to make sure the temp dir is cleaned up
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~johngarbutt

comments.content: This is really old, owned by a core contributor. Marking as an invalid bug that was probably used for self tracking.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~sdague
